results.title: Common web application architectures - .NET
results.description: Common web application architectures Tip This content is an exc... Using Docker, you can deploy a single VM as a Docker host, and run multiple instances. The Docker hosts can be managed with commands like docker run performed manually, or through automation such as Continuous Delivery (CD) pipelines. Tearing down a Docker instance is as easy as.
